name: BeKind
0:
”Alexa, ask be kind to give me a random act of kindness”
”Alexa, ask be kind to give me today's random act of kindness”
”Alexa, ask be kind to give me today's kindness idea”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: be kind
des: Be Kind provides you with a suggested daily act of kindness to pay it forward to others. Ask Alexa to give you act of kindness ideas on a daily basis or by random selection.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
